flawed_nl_solution:
In the first two hours, Keenan writes 800 words because 400*2=<<400*2=800>>800.
After that, she still needs to write 4000 words because 1200-800=<<1200-800=4000>>4000.
Since she writes 200 words per hour, she will take 20 hours to write the last 4000 words because 4000/200=<<4000/200=20>>20.
Thus, she needs to start 22 hours before the deadline because 2+20=<<2+20=22>>22.
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
